blocks.text: You don't follow the Whisper — you dissect it. Like a chirurgeon examining a specimen, you isolate the psychic frequency, parsing its components with trained precision. It's not one voice. It's many — at least seven, possibly more — forced into harmonic alignment. A psychic chorus, singing in a frequency that resonates with the Immaterium.

More than that: the frequency is modulated. Someone is shaping it, adjusting the pitch and amplitude with expert precision. This isn't the work of a demagogue or a madman. This is a trained psyker — possibly Sanctioned, possibly rogue — who understands psychic mechanics at a fundamental level. You relay your analysis to Interrogator Lira, who records every word on her data-slate with grim efficiency.
Chapter 1 Complete. Your analysis has provided military-grade intelligence about the Choir's composition and leadership. Inquisitor Voss will be impressed.

choices.text: Knowledge is the Emperor's sword. You have sharpened it well.
